description: OsDBuilder is a PowerShell-based tool designed for creating custom Windows installation media. It allows users to build installation media that includes various language packs and localizations, ensuring compatibility with specific regional requirements. The tool has been effectively used by professionals for over four years, highlighting its reliability and efficiency in simplifying the deployment process. Users can execute build tasks to create the installation media tailored to their needs, facilitating smoother deployments in enterprise environments. Documentation and updates for OsDBuilder can be accessed through its GitHub repository and PowerShell Gallery.
